title: PC Building

description: High-performance custom PC builds optimized for gaming and content creation.

content.heading: Custom Builds
content.text: I design and build custom PCs tailored to specific use cases, whether it's high-refresh gaming, video editing, 3D rendering, or general productivity. Each build is carefully planned for optimal performance, thermals, and aesthetics.

content.heading: Philosophy
content.text: Every component is selected with purpose. I believe in balanced builds where no single component bottlenecks the system, clean cable management for improved airflow, and future-proofing where it makes sense.
